name: Mr. Television
description:
Mr. Television was created for GDKO 2023 Round 2.The theme was "Tell a story using sound." I wanted to make an SCP/Wario-ware styled game. It's not as polished as I'd like, (I was working on too many jams at once. I've learnt my lesson.)but I hope you'll enjoy it.

Controls - Just the arrow keys for the games.

Press space to advance the intro text.

You'll need to click the arrows to advance when you get to the wall of text.

The opening is a bit longer than I would have liked, but I really wanted to push the theme of using sound to tell a story. If you'd like to skip it, hit ESC, though the audio will carry over till the second game. 

If you fail any of the games, you'll have to restart unfortunaly, just a massive oversight on my part. Just don't fail, they're easy.

Pressing R will restart the entire game.
